rankings.title: Effect of Salary Transparency Laws on Wage Levels and Gender Wage Gaps (Idea 1)
conditions: extend pre-period to ≥10 years if using CPS/ACS
align timing to “income year” vs law effective dates
explicitly address spillovers/SUTVA with sensitivity checks
pre-register a credible set of concurrent-policy controls
